pbc.help: Kinetic Monte Carlo simulation for multiple carriers in PBC
pbc.label: calc:binary

outtime.help: Time difference between outputs into the trajectory file.

seed.help: Integer to initialise the random number generator for events

injectionmethod.help: Random or uniform injection of the carriers.

nelectrons.help: Number of electrons in the simulation box

nholes.help: Number of holes in the simulation box

fieldX.help: x component of the external electric field

fieldY.help: y component of the external electric field

fieldZ.help: z component of the external electric field

temperature.help: Temperature of the system for rate calculation

rates.help: Method of rate input: read (from file) or calculate (in KMC)

interaction.help: Method of interaction between like charge carriers (Pauli or Coulomb)
